column5: hi guys just curious how you tell the 'age' of an engine...neighbour has a 20hp merc (black/red...not with the blue stripes)...just looking for a manual for it but not sure what year it is... thanks
Get the seial number for it and go to a dealer. They can look up the make , model and year made of the unit.  muddler
Give me the make and serial number, I'll get you the manual.

thx Roy...how much are they these days?  just ran over..lol  looks like it is a 2002 20hp merc..heavy too! (112lbs) ouch.....  I know she had it winterized and the label says do not operate it until de-winterized..curious what that involves? is the gas/oil ratio 100:1 for these?  thx for the info
